LanguageData.VME_NeedAnonymity.stages.0.label: anonymity violated
LanguageData.VME_NeedAnonymity.stages.0.description: They know everything, I’m an open book, entirely vulnerable and without a shred of nuance.
LanguageData.VME_NeedAnonymity.stages.1.label: anonymity compromised
LanguageData.VME_NeedAnonymity.stages.1.description: My identity has been deeply compromised, I’m so ashamed by the attention I’ve garnered for myself.
LanguageData.VME_NeedAnonymity.stages.2.label: anonymity threatened
LanguageData.VME_NeedAnonymity.stages.2.description: This can’t be allowed to continue, if I keep this behavior up I’ll be exposed.
LanguageData.VME_NeedAnonymity.stages.3.label: completely anonymous
LanguageData.VME_NeedAnonymity.stages.3.description: I feel so much more comfortable like this. I don’t even think they know my name or face.
